thread.title: 7 Genius Recipes for Cooking the Finest Chicken of your Life
thread.title_full: 7 Genius Recipes for Cooking the Finest Chicken of your Life

author: Kristen Miglore
title: 7 Genius Recipes for Cooking the Finest Chicken of your Life
text:
If you like it, save it! 
Save and organize all of the stuff you love in one place. Got it! 
Click the heart, it's called favoriting. Favorite the stuff you like. Got it! ✉ Email 
Here are seven brilliant, proven, utterly delicious chicken recipes from some of the greatest cookbook authors of the last 50 years—how about that? 
So next time I dare you to trust me and try something a little weird— sunflower seed risotto , or burnt toast soup , perhaps—I want you remember this moment. Advertisement 
(But also: Send me your genius chicken tips, because you're not the only ones who love it.) ♥ +
